name: Aurora
detail:
Aurora is the main protagonist of Child of Light. The daughter of a duchess and duke from 1895 Austria, Aurora is intelligent and mischievous. Since her mother's untimely death, she had grown up sheltered by her father. Now to find her way home she must journey across Lemuria and defeat the Queen of the Night and collect the sun, moon, and stars.
She is helped by Igniculus, a firefly sent by The Lady of the Forest. Igniculus helps her in various ways, solving puzzles and traps, healing, stunning Night Creatures as well as providing light. Igniculus is the first being she meets, and he helps guide her in Lemuria.

In her quest, she gathers friends and allies to help her along her way.
